
Subject: Last warning before dedicated server shutdown

Hello %%%FIRST_NAME%%%,

Your dedicated server %%%SERVER_HOSTNAME%%%
has expired %%%EXPIRED_DAYS%%% days ago, on the: %%%EXPIRATION_DATE%%%.

Please login into your control panel at:

%%%DTC_CLIENT_URL%%%

with your login %%%DTC_ADM_LOGIN%%%, click on your server tab, and
renew it.

This is our last warning before we shutdown your server. Please
understand that we can't keep your server running as we need the space
for other customers, and that hosting has to be paid in advance. If you
don't renew, your server will be shutdown in 3 days.

%%%SIGNATURE%%%
